definition: to levy troops/recruitment
4th note in pentatonic scale 五音[wu3 yin1], roughly sol/see also 徵|征[zheng1]
to invite/to recruit/to levy (taxes)/to draft (troops)/phenomenon/symptom/characteristic sign (used as proof)/evidence
soldiers/a force/an army/weapons/arms/military/warlike/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: In the U. K. a kind of conscription was long in force.
sentences.chinese: 在聯合王國，一種徵兵制長期有效。

sentences.english: Tanggu District, recruiting Work Conference held in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 塘沽區召開2009年度徵兵工作會議。

sentences.english: An Enlisted Soldier's rank can range from Private to Sergeant Major of the Army.
sentences.chinese: 一名募徵兵的軍銜從列兵至總軍士長。

sentences.english: In countries where there is conscription men are called up at the age of eighteen．（call up men／call men up／call them up）
sentences.chinese: 在實行徵兵制的國家裏，18歲的男子要應徵服役。

sentences.english: What does conscript check-up have is there scar to you can go on specific requirement body?
sentences.chinese: 徵兵體檢有什麼具體要求身上有疤能行麼？

sentences.english: South Korea’s mandatory conscription has all men serving in the army or the police force.
sentences.chinese: 韓國的強制徵兵制是許多男人在軍隊或警察部隊服役。

sentences.english: To fill the graveyard shift, hospitals sometimes resort to the draft.
sentences.chinese: 裝滿墓地，醫院有時候會把徵兵制度作爲最後手段。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the application of psychological testing during the health checkup of the conscription.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討心理測驗在義務兵徵兵體檢中的應用。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the application of Psychological testing during the health check-up of compulsory servicemen.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討心理測驗在義務兵徵兵體檢中的應用。

sentences.english: His first act as secretary? Reinstating the draft.
sentences.chinese: 如果他首次擔任國防部長，他必將恢復徵兵服役。

sentences.english: This leads to a classroom debate about the contemporary questions surrounding war and conscription.
sentences.chinese: 這引發了對戰爭和徵兵等當代問題的課堂辯論。

sentences.english: Can the government conscript people and send them into battle?
sentences.chinese: 政府可以徵兵並把人們送到戰場麼？

sentences.english: And all draft records from that period had been destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 那個時期的徵兵記錄也已經全部被銷燬了。

sentences.english: He was 16 when war broke out and reached 18 as conscription was being introduced.
sentences.chinese: 在他16歲那年戰爭爆發了，徵兵時他恰滿18歲。

sentences.english: The man flee to the mountain to avoid the conscription.
sentences.chinese: 爲了逃避徵兵，那個人躲到山裏去了。

sentences.english: This is today winter the one big move in check-up of this city conscript .
sentences.chinese: 這是今冬本市徵兵體檢中的一大舉措。

the Qin army (model for the terracotta warriors)

dictatorship
